main event: An unidentified flying object was observed moving at high speed and changing in size, making a whooshing sound as it moved, near Shiraz, Iran on September 23-29, 1962.
interesting points: The object was observed by a military officer (Capt. G).
The object's behavior was consistent with a satellite or missile, but the whooshing sound was unusual for those types of objects.
The local military authorities were notified of the sighting.
The observer could not determine what the object was.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object that moved at high speed, shrinking and expanding in size, and made a whooshing sound
